description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into magma at will, making them a Magma Human.

users.circumstances: Sakazuki (Akainu) consumed this fruit at an unknown time before his introduction

abilityReveals.description: The Magu Magu no Mi's power permanently transformed half of Punk Hazard into a burning wasteland during the ten-day battle with Aokiji, suggesting Devil Fruit Awakening.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: During the Fleet Admiral battle, Akainu's magma powers permanently altered Punk Hazard's climate, leaving half the island in eternal flames.

strengths.description: The battle on Punk Hazard demonstrated the fruit's ability to cause permanent environmental changes.

awakening.description: Heavily implied through the permanent environmental changes to Punk Hazard

abilityReveals.description: The Hie Hie no Mi's power permanently transformed half of Punk Hazard into a frozen wasteland during the ten-day battle with Akainu, suggesting Devil Fruit Awakening.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: During the Fleet Admiral battle, Aokiji's ice powers permanently altered Punk Hazard's climate, leaving half the island in eternal ice.

strengths.description: The battle on Punk Hazard demonstrated the fruit's ability to cause permanent environmental changes.
